org.anarres.tftp.protocol.codec

Class TftpPacketEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.tftp.protocol.codec.TftpPacketEncoder

  • public class TftpPacketEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an example which uses ByteBuffer.allocate(int). You may wish to use your own allocator and call TftpPacket.toWire(java.nio.ByteBuffer) yourself.
